targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', query_id, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(xact_duration) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', query_id, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        query_id,
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY avg(created_at) DESC)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='pg_stat_activity', user='1' */
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', query_id, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(xact_duration) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1753641627)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753645227)))
    AND((created_at >= 1753641627) AND(created_at <= 1753645227))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753641627))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753645227))
    AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
    AND datname = 'test'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', query_id, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1753641627)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753645227)))
        AND((created_at >= 1753641627) AND(created_at <= 1753645227))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753641627))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753645227))
        AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
        AND datname = 'test'
    GROUP BY
        query_id,
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY avg(created_at) DESC)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    username,
    xact_start,
    query_start,
    state,
    query,
    query_id,
    backend_type,
    last_value(wait_event),
    last_value(xact_duration),
    last_value(query_duration)
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND query IN (
    SELECT
      query
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        query
    ORDER BY avg(created_at) DESC)
GROUP BY username, xact_start, query_start, state, query, query_id, backend_type
ORDER by query DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='pg_stat_activity', user='1' */
SELECT
    username,
    xact_start,
    query_start,
    state,
    query,
    query_id,
    backend_type,
    last_value(wait_event),
    last_value(xact_duration),
    last_value(query_duration)
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1753641553)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753645153)))
    AND((created_at >= 1753641553) AND(created_at <= 1753645153))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753641553))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753645153))
    AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
    AND datname = 'test'
    AND query IN (
    SELECT
      query
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1753641553)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753645153)))
        AND((created_at >= 1753641553) AND(created_at <= 1753645153))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753641553))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753645153))
        AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
        AND datname = 'test'
    GROUP BY
        query
    ORDER BY avg(created_at) DESC)
GROUP BY username, xact_start, query_start, state, query, query_id, backend_type
ORDER by query DESC

list.definition: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by datname order by datname
list.label: database
list.name: datname
list.query: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by datname order by datname

list.definition: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by hostname order by hostname
list.label: instance
list.name: hostname
list.query: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_activity where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by hostname order by hostname
